item.title: TOST
item.description: score:11 Chances: The growth-focused money manager added to these three existing positions on Monday. Considering Toast’s strong and weak points, is the stock a buy, a sell, or a hold right now? High growth and low risk are a compelling combination. There are terrific buying opportunities in beaten-down growth stocks right now.
